meanings.definition: Having an abnormal number of chromosomes.
meanings.sent1: The aneuploid cell had too many chromosomes.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the aneuploid samples under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The aneuploid chromosome decided to throw a party with extra guests.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like aneuploid puzzles, pieces not fitting together correctly.
meanings.sent5: The aneuploid flowers in the garden stood out with their unique colors.

meanings.definition: A cell or organism with an abnormal number of chromosomes.
meanings.sent1: The aneuploid was carefully examined by the geneticist.
meanings.sent2: An aneuploid can have various effects on an organism's development.
meanings.sent3: The aneuploid in the petri dish seemed to be dancing under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: The team worked together like aneuploid cells, each one playing a different role.
meanings.sent5: The aneuploid fish in the pond swam in irregular patterns.
